snippet: Agnieszka Radwanska said she was "shocked, like everyone else" when Maria Sharapova revealed Monday that she failed a drug test in January at the Australian Open....
lead_paragraph: Agnieszka Radwanska said she was "shocked, like everyone else" when Maria Sharapova revealed Monday that she failed a drug test in January at the Australian Open.

headline.print_headline: Players Shocked, Saddened by Maria Sharapova's 'Big Mistake'
headline.main: Players Shocked, Saddened by Maria Sharapova's 'Big Mistake'
